title: I don't even think armor penetration is worth it tbfh. Just build more lifesteal and damage.
body:
lets see, 40 ad from last whisper...

or 80 ad from bloodthirster + 20% lifesteal and a shield.

hrmm

So if i take the last whisper i will kill them 20-30% faster unless they kill me first, but if I take bloodthirster I will outheal their damage (barring thornmail) and last forever anyway

nthx m8 i'll take bloodthirster.
